title: Leading games on Twitch as of July 2019 , by hours viewed
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours in millions for 10 number of Video Games.
The maximum Number of hours in millions 24.8 is found at Video Game Fortnite and the minimum is found at Apex Legends where Video Game is 4.0.
The Number of hours in millions of Video Game Fortnite is 6.2% larger than the minimum value at Apex Legends.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Number of hours in millions in each Video Game on the y axis.
The Number of hours in millions is appeared to be the highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours in millions for 10 number of Video Games.
The maximum Number of hours in millions 24.8 is found at Video Game Fortnite and the minimum is found at Apex Legends where Video Game is 4.0.
The Number of hours in millions of Video Game Fortnite is 6.2% larger than the minimum value at Apex Legends.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours in millions for 10 number of Video Games.
The Number of hours in millions is highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
The minimum Video Game Apex Legends has got 6.2 times less Number of hours in millions than the maximum Video Game Fortnite.
Number of hours in millions at Video Game Fortnite is 24.8 , second place is League of Legends at 13.7, and thirdly is GTA V at 13.1.
The highest value 24.8 at Fortnite is almost 2.41 times larger than the average value 10.29.
Summing up the values of all Video Games, we get total 102.9.
